attributes.action: excempt from fuel and any road charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: being a disabled driver amputee cars is only way to get around dont the goverment think in there wisdom should reduce the levy on fuel and any other road charges for the real disableds of this country plus give the cold weather payment to the disabled as well we cannot get up and walk around my heating bill is rather large as i am disabled
